metadata.dc:author: Guliás Piñeiro, A
Fraguela Mariña, J A
Freire Rodríguez, D
Gómez Freijoso, C
Aguirrezabalaga González, J
Taboada Filgueira, L
Acea Nebril, B
Sánchez Blas, M
metadata.dc:description: Villous adenoma of the appendix is a rare pathologic entity, the treatment is controversial. We describe the case of a patient complaining of abdominal pain that was diagnosed as acute appendicitis. Pathological examination of the surgical specimen revealed a villous adenoma of the appendix. We comment the therapeutic options and we review the literature about this pathological entity.
metadata.dc:title: Adenoma velloso de apéndice causante de apendicitis aguda.
[Villous adenoma of the appendix caused acute appendicitis].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
